p: In this paper, only the components with VIP values â‰¥2 were selected and regarded as the most significant differential chemical markers, and the biosynthesis pathway of 13 different components was summarized, as shown in Fig 6, according to the literature [ 8, 33]. Now, more than 120 components have been reported in S. baicalensis [ 8], and in reality, the number of activity-relevant pathways must be numerous to maintain the equilibrium of ROS as quickly and delicately as possible.
